      • getType

        public String getType()
        Description copied from interface: IModelAdaptor
        Answers the type of source consumed by this adaptor. Usually is the same as the expected file type of the data (e.g. "xml" or "json". The value should be in lower case.
        Specified by:
        getType in interface IModelAdaptor
        Returns:
